channel.title: Korg-Triton on NearTao's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Korg-Triton on NearTao's Blog

item.title: Korg Triton Plugin Impressions
item.description: While I am normally a bit of a hardware snob lately… I cannot help but continue to be wow’d by just how far software has come, and where software continues to be going. For all the lack of knobs, you often get an incredible amount of features, as well as a reduced price of entry. Sure, you’re ignoring the cost of the computer, but most people these days have one anyways.
